Indeed, U.S. web searches for “abortion near me” are 5 times more common than for “colonoscopy near me” (1). Patient-oriented webpages may play an important role in patients locating abortion providers, learning about the procedure, and scheduling care. However, it is unknown whether hospitals and their health systems offer these online resources.Objective: To examine the websites of U.S. hospitals, including those with specialized abortion training programs, to measure how often they offer information about abortion and its provision at their facilities compared with colonoscopy, ...References1.
